author: marchhill
content: Hi, I want to check in with other teams about whether they are deleting old headers as part of history expiry. EIP-4444 suggests that clients could prune old headers and break full sync - are we in agreement to do this?

author: kolbyml
content: At Devcon it was agreed upon that all nodes would keep all headers still as it is only 20gb* for the full set

author: kolbyml
content: So only bodies and receipts are prunable
